publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-19.3 Euan Robson: As an amendment to the motion (S1M-19) in the name of Ross Finnie, at end insert "and the Scottish fishing organisations have considerable concerns about the said Order; and calls upon the relevant Minister to (a) meet representatives of the Scottish fishing industry to discuss their concern and in particular their desire to re-establish the custom and practice of former years in regard to the east coast boundary and (b) convey such concerns to the Secretary of State for Scotland." Supported by: Mike Rumbles, George Lyon, Margaret Smith, Tavish Scott Â
